articles.content: Elon Musk, chief executive officer of Tesla Inc., during a fireside discussion on artificial intelligence in London, UK, on Thursday, Nov. 2, 2023.

articles.title: SJVN bags 1,352 MW solar projects worth Rs 7,436 cr - The Economic Times
articles.description: SJVN Chairman and Managing Director Geeta Kapur informed that these projects of 1,352 MW will be developed at various locations in Maharashtra -- Nashik, Solapur, Ahmednagar and Pune under Mukhya Mantri Saur Krushi Vahini Yojana 2.0.
articles.content: State-owned power producer SJVN arm SJVN Green Energy has secured 1,352 MW solar power projects, entailing an investment of Rs 7,436 crore. "SJVN has received Letter of Awards (LoA) for 1,352 MW Sola… [+1619 chars]
